title: Input schema for AI Tools Harvester
description: Enter a use case or task description to receive recommended AI tools. Configure optional matching and result settings, then run the Actor to scrape and rank relevant AI tools.

query.title: Use case or task
query.description: Describe what you want to use AI for (e.g. personal assistant, content writing, meeting notes).

maxResults.title: Maximum results
maxResults.description: Maximum number of AI tools to return.

strictness.title: Matching strictness
strictness.description: Controls how strictly the input query must match tool descriptions (0 = loose, 100 = very strict).

enableScraping.title: Enable live scraping
enableScraping.description: If enabled, the Actor will scrape sources live. If disabled, it may use cached or static data.

sources.title: Sources to include
sources.description: Optional list of sources to scrape AI tools from.
